title: Analyze A/B Test Results
description: An analyst needs to determine the winner of a landing page A/B test based on conversion rate.

tasks.description: Retrieve the performance data for the two landing page versions (A and B), including visitors and conversions for each.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls the data from the A/B testing tool.

tasks.description: Calculate the conversion rate for each version.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the conversion rates (e.g., Version A: 3.5%, Version B: 4.2%).

tasks.description: Check for statistical significance to ensure the result is not due to random chance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the result is statistically significant at a 95% confidence level.

tasks.description: Declare the winning version and recommend deploying it to 100% of traffic.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear recommendation based on the data.
